Date: Saturday, 3/1/1988
Subject: Trade offer
Dear Sir,
I would like to offer you following trade:
LF Billy Young, 1B Henry Metts, SP Rueben Morris
in return for
SP Victor Lozano.

Please let me know if you accept!

Best Regards,
Halifax GM

Date: Thursday, 5/1/1988
Subject: Progress of Gerald Hartsfield
Dear Sir,
Gerald Hartsfield is hitting the ball well at A Somer's Point Tug Boats!
He has an AVG of .333, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director

Subject: Progress of Robert Snelling
Dear Sir,

a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1988
Subject: Status of Augustine Marzano
Dear Sir,
Augustine Marzano shouldn't play at AA Margate Bridges!
He has an AVG of .178 over there, that might
be a sign that he has been promoted to soon. You
should demote him before he gets burned.

Regards,
Scouting Director
